name: Match It ! Matches Puzzle Game
description:
Challenge yourself with match puzzles!

Solve puzzles by adding, moving or removing matches until you find the right solution.

- 100 unique levels.

- Develop logical thinking and problem-solving.

- Improve attention and focusing with logical puzzles.

A totally free game, hints and answers are provided by watching ads. These ads allow us to continue working on new and different games.

Please don't hesitate to reach us via :
